title: West End Brat
description: The next adventure of Montana Stanford is here. Read about the continuing escapades of Montana Stanford in N.M. McGregor’s next book, West End Brat. After all she’s been through the bedrock of her relationships is stronger than ever. Unknown to her, the trials and tribulations have just begun. Haunted by enemies old and new, she is in constant danger. Never one to deal with conflict in a normal fashion, have her childhood lessons prepared her for a bigger threat? Read the second book in the Montana series to find out.
author: N.M. McGregor
